decisions.description: The Constitution does not bar application of the forum State's statute of limitations to claims governed by the substantive law of a different State.

decisions.description: The Kansas Supreme Court did not violate the Full Faith and Credit Clause or the Due Process Clause in its constructions of the laws of Texas, Oklahoma, and Louisiana regarding interest.
